title: When Yorick finally gets a new skin.

Its only 2 skins at a time so it will either be Jax or Yorick teaming with jhin.

That doesn't sound like the skins team that loves to bait...
I just mean they usually only realease them in groups of 2, Kennen and Yas for example.
